name: Perona
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and reveal up to 1 [Thriller Bark Pirates] type card or a "Dracule Mihawk" and put it into your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, discard 1 card from your hand.
